resources.string: Choose your zodiac sign in settings

\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0This day may bring unexpected changes to your plans. You will feel that life is pushing you to make important decisions, especially in your personal relationships and career. In the morning, there may be minor conflicts or misunderstandings, but they will quickly disappear if you show patience and diplomacy, which Libras are usually known for. In the afternoon, the stars will favour conversations that will help clarify the situation and strengthen relationships.\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0\u00A0In the financial sphere, you should be careful - do not make hasty decisions about money, it is better to postpone any important purchases. Instead, focus on long-term plans.
